CSL_DssVidPipeLumaCfg Struct Reference
IP » DSS CSL-FL » DSS Video Pipe CSL FL

DSS Video Pipe Luma Key Config parameters. More...

#include <csl_dssVideoPipe.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t lumaKeyEnable
 
uint32_t lumaKeyMinVal
 
uint32_t lumaKeyMaxVal
 

Detailed Description

DSS Video Pipe Luma Key Config parameters.

Field Documentation

uint32_t CSL_DssVidPipeLumaCfg::lumaKeyEnable

Enable Luma Key transparency matching FALSE: Disable luma key operation TRUE: Enable luma key operation

uint32_t CSL_DssVidPipeLumaCfg::lumaKeyMaxVal

12 bit Luma Key Max Value. luma_key_min <= Pixel's y <= luma_key_max. If condition is true alpha value will be forced to ZERO

uint32_t CSL_DssVidPipeLumaCfg::lumaKeyMinVal

12 bit Luma Key Min Value. luma_key_min <= Pixel's y <= luma_key_max. If condition is true alpha value will be forced to ZERO
